quote: When you love someone, you love the person as they are, and not as you'd like them to be. – Leo Tolstoy
fact: Larry Lewis ran the 100-yard dash in 17.8 seconds in 1969, thereby setting a new world`s record for runners in the 100-years-or-older class. He was 101.
joke: Can a kangaroo jump higher than the Empire State Building? Of course. The Empire State Building can't jump.
